divs: sighting detailsi was walking down elm street in el cerrito, ca on 1\23\2012. it was clear out, so i was looking up at the stars. when i looked up, for aprox. 45 seconds, there was this amazingly bright light whose flight path streaked across the entire sky. there was no tail, and it was faster than a shooting star. the light was unnatural like a super white led. it streaked across the sky and disappeared. there was no obstruction of view, it simply vanished.
Summary: Appeared to be a shooting star, but unnaturally bright lights, faster than any known object. Straight flight then vanished.
trends: There has been one other sighting in El Cerrito
There were no other sightings in El Cerrito on or around January 23rd 2012
